text: FREAKPHONE is now version 3.5! Most pages have been updated. Under the hood, the site is now generated with 11ty. New pages include a blog, a few explore pages, and updates to the about and link directories.
Tweaks made to the front page. More general changes are on the way sitewide!
I made a javascript dress-up game, featuring my OC Opal. go put some clothes on that beast
New artwork, on a rebuilt art page.
